channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - Technology

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The current crisis has shown us just how many people can do their job effectively from home. The question is, why have they previously been confined to offices?
item.title: Home truths: the lesson to be learned from workers in isolation

item.dc:creator: Tim Biggs
item.description: Researchers have called out the popular video conferencing service for its "weak" encryption, and expressed worry about its Chinese connection.
item.title: Zoom says it's safe for Australian companies to use as security concerns escalate

item.dc:creator: Caitlin Fitzsimmons
item.description: The eSafety commissioner has logged a 40 per cent increase in reports over the past three weeks, as Australia heads online to work, study and socialise.
item.title: Online abuse surges along with screen use during virus pandemic

item.dc:creator: Ben Grubb
item.description: Vodafone has provided mobile phone location data to the federal and NSW governments to monitor whether Australians are following social distancing restrictions.
item.title: Mobile phone location data used to track Australians' movements during coronavirus crisis

item.dc:creator: Michael Koziol
item.description: The warning follows sustained international coverage about alleged privacy deficiencies of video-conferencing.
item.title: Zoom, video conferencing apps under privacy commissioner's microscope

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Beyond the sound quality, vinyl is about the tactile analogue experience that's been lost in the digital age.
item.title: Rediscovering vinyl in the age of social isolation

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: With Doom Eternal, genre pioneer id Software has refined the blueprint of 2016’s Doom reboot, improving on every single aspect.
item.title: Genre pioneers deliver a hellish masterpiece

item.description: The very strategies that can help fight a plague can also be abused once it's over.
item.title: Big Brother may keep watching when coronavirus pandemic passes

item.description: The news that Boris Johnson hosted a Cabinet meeting via Zoom has sparked concerns about the app's security levels.
item.title: Zoombombing: Just who is listening to your video conference call?

item.dc:creator: Supratim Adhikari
item.description: The boss of messaging service Slack says the coronavirus pandemic has hastened the demise of work email, as workers ditch their cubicles for the safety of home.
item.title: Remote work boom spells doom for corporate inboxes: Slack CEO

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: How I rekindled my love of CDs while testing a new Cambridge and ELAC home hi-fi system.
item.title: Audio comfort in times of need

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: HPM offers a more built-in avenue to enhance your home's intelligence with smart sockets and switches.
item.title: Switching to a smarter home with Arteor

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: Persevere with some punishing fighting to unlock a finely crafted Samurai title.
item.title: Nioh 2 transcends mere Dark Souls clone

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The 2020 revision sees even more power under the hood, but an operating system that lags behind.
item.title: Apple doubles down on hardware with new iPad Pro

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: After getting the tech aspects sorted, it helps to get into a routine and create rituals.
item.title: Staying sane when working from home

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The 2020 Air is now the best small laptop Apple makes, as well as the cheapest.
item.title: Apple's MacBook Air makes a welcome return

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Belong pulls its 100Mbps NBN plan after old infrastructure denies promised speeds to customers.
item.title: Aussies face life in the NBN slow lane

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: Zooming into noisy oblivion with the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra's phone camera.
item.title: Does anyone really need 100x zoom?

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: Following controversy in Hong Kong last year, the game's developer hopes a major update can spark a new era.
item.title: Hearthstone update like chess adding a new piece

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: Pantheone 1 aims high but delivers on its lofty promises and price tag.
item.title: Striking speaker in a timeless design

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: Dance your way through forests, grottos, and windswept plains of Ori and the Will of the Wisps.
item.title: Ori sequel has all the punishing charm of the original

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: Media Mod adds just a small amount of bulk to Hero 8 while making it a far more capable device.
item.title: GoPro add-ons create a pocket powerhouse

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Sometimes getting the best sound out of your smart TV requires a magic touch.
item.title: When your smart TV leaves you dumbstruck

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: An intuitive, powerful creative suite hampered only by a closed ecosystem.
item.title: Creating anything you can imagine in Dreams

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: First wireless hair straightener with flexing plates boasts high performance, but at a price.
item.title: Dyson looks to ‘Corrale’ your hair

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: Pitched at gamers who want the best hardware in a great case without doing any research.
item.title: Aurora Pro R9 puts gaming up in lights

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Telstra customers will be the first in the country to get a taste of the "millimetre wave" 5G trials.
item.title: A new wave of 5G to hit Australia

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: The AirFly Pro might be the perfect solution to the problem of sharing music.
item.title: A wax-free way to share audio

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Switching across to the network doesn't mean abandoning all the telephone handsets around your home.
item.title: Don't lose your home phone when connecting to NBN

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The monitor’s design is as practical as it is aesthetic.
item.title: Alienware monitor to invade your gaming room

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: Funny but stressful, Two Point Hospital is engrossing in the least relaxing way possible.
item.title: Ruin the healthcare system from the comfort of home

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: Some helpful tips to unlock the potential of the smartphone camera in your pocket.
item.title: Getting the most out of your phone camera

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: While a promising concept, the TCL Movetime Family Watch fails to deliver on its potential.
item.title: Smartwatch for children with room for improvement

item.dc:creator: David Milner
item.description: The game's poetic, beautiful and profound narrative verges on pure art.
item.title: Finding meaning down Kentucky Route Zero

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: Parents no longer have to share the app with their children, but an account upgrade might be required.
item.title: Spotify caters to a younger new audience

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The flagship GSP 670 wireless gaming headset has appeal that should reach beyond the gaming market.
item.title: Sennheiser delivers premium, multi-use headset, but at a price

item.dc:creator: Adam Turner
item.description: Buying a first phone for your child can be a daunting task with so many options on the market, but it can pay to pay a little more.
item.title: Don’t go too budget on your child's first smartphone

item.dc:creator: Tim Biggs
item.description: With smart homes picking sides between Assistant and Alexa, it's nice to find devices that support both. Just be sure to read the fine print.
item.title: When it comes to agnostic smart speakers, devil is in the detail

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: The Suunto 7 manages to do everything a fitness fiend could ask for, while still being a useful and useable smartwatch for daily wear.
item.title: The best fitness watch still has something to offer couch potatoes

item.dc:creator: Peter Wells
item.description: The HTC 5G Hub can get internet to all your devices at home or while travelling, but the current 5G footprint will make it less impressive for most.
item.title: On-the-go 5G for all your devices, if you can find coverage

item.dc:creator: Krishan Sharma
item.description: An ARM processor means you'll want to stick to Microsoft Store apps wherever possible, but otherwise this is a great portable PC.
item.title: Samsung's latest ultrabook is fast and long-lasting, with caveats

item.description: As experts work to stem the global spread of coronavirus, gamers have turned their attention to parallel, imaginary struggles.
item.title: Coronavirus sparks surge in virus video games

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: Whether you need something to keep theives at bay, carry a mountain of stuff or just look great with a power suit, these bags have you covered.
item.title: The best, most secure and prettiest laptop bags

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: Do phone with folding screens really solve an existing problem, or are they all hype?
item.title: Who wants foldable phones; consumers or phone-makers?

item.dc:creator: Tim Biggs
item.description: Warcraft III Reforged is the nicest way to experience the incredible storytelling and characters of the series pre-WoW.
item.title: More refreshed than Reforged, Warcraft III is still an all-time great

item.dc:creator: Tim Biggs
item.description: In a vacuum Facebook's video calling device would be easy to recommend, but coming from such a contentious company makes things more complicated.
item.title: Portal video phone is solid, but it's hard to ignore Facebook's record

item.dc:creator: Tim Biggs
item.description: It might not be very original, but this teen drama with playable arcade interludes is worth it for the pixel art presentation, music and nostalgia fuel alone.
item.title: Arcade escapism meets '80s coming-of-age story in 198X

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: A huge main sensor and periscope telephoto lens make for a 10x 'hybrid optic' zoom, and up to 100x digital zoom.
item.title: S20 Ultra's massive zoom could be a mobile photography game changer

item.dc:creator: Krishan Sharma
item.description: Mobile World Congress has been cancelled after Intel, Sony, Facebook, Amazon, LG and others withdrew from the show over fears of virus spreading.
item.title: Coronavirus scuttles plans for world's biggest phone show

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: Connected home technology is increasingly being misused by perpetrators to menace their domestic partners, experts say.
item.title: Domestic abuse and the darker side of the smart home
